 2003-09962003-06-18FIN,  ,  ,  , 
ActTrust and Loan Companies Act
PrecisEnactment of the EXEMPTION FROM APPROVAL FOR CERTAIN INVESTMENTS IN INTRAGROUP SERVICE ENTITIES (TRUST AND LOAN COMPANIES) REGULATIONS which clarify that trust and loan companies may, without applying for the Superintendent's or the Minister's approval, invest in entities solely engaged in lending exclusively to members of their own group.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2003-0245 Publication Date: 2003-07-02
AttachmentsAttachment
